entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 except minus 10 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 6 except minus 10 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
